sentences.sContent: I volunteered my services as a driver.
...Women want to be able to do it all volunteer for school parties or cook delicious meals，and so their answer to any request is often Yes...
...has missed the excitement of her profession and does not fed she would be satisfied doing volunteer work...
...he thinks that she should do volunteer work one or two days a week...
...which grew out of volunteer evening seminars for students...
...has missed the excitement of her profession and does not feel she would be satisfied doing volunteer work...

words.tran: 自愿的；志愿的；自发的；故意的

trans.tranCn: 自愿提供； 自愿， 志愿
trans.tranOther: to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do
someone who does a job willingly without being paid
